summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to environmental policies and procedures and environmentally critical areas; correcting inadvertent errors, clarifying regulatory requirements, and bringing regulations and definitions in conformance with the Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Section 22.800, Seattle Stormwater, Grading and Drainage Code, by amending Section 25.05.908 of SMC Chapter 25.05, Environmental Policies and Procedures, and by amending the following Sections of SMC 25.09, Regulations for Environmentally Critical Areas: Sections 25.09.040, 25.09.060, 25.09.080, 25.09.140, 25.09.160, 25.09.180, 25.09.200, 25.09.240, 25.09.260, 25.09.280, 25.09.300, 25.09.320, 25.09.340, and 25.09.420.
